hackathon-rules: GrizzHacks rules are simple: Don't start your hack before the event, and have fun! Participants must also follow the MLH Code of Conduct: http://mlh.io/code-of-conduct

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=115 Library Dr, Rochester, MI 48309, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How impressive was the technology used in the project?
Was this a unique idea that the team came up with?
Did the team put effort into the presentation of their project beyond an MVP?
Did the team stretch themselves to learn new things instead of staying within their comfort zone?
